name: I Got Your Back
title: Noelle: I Got Your Back
desc: A stout heart is the sternest armor.
in_play_description: After Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Noelle to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Noelle, equip this card.
After Noelle equips this card, immediately use Breastplate once.
After Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Noelle in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
